Methodologies: Competition assay using enzyme-labeled drug and antibody
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Lin-Zhi International Opiate Enzyme Immunoassay for qualitative and semi-quantitative detection of opiates in urine on automated analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of opiates in human urine at a cutoff value of 300 ng/mL when calibrated against morphine, for professional use with automated clinical chemistry analyzers; provides preliminary analytical result requiring confirmatory testing
